column3: The best thing about Berlin was that I got to be surrounded by people who pursue their ideas for themselves.
The best of a book is not the thought which it contains, but the thought which it suggests; just as the charm of music dwells not in the tones but in the echoes of our hearts.
Ceremonies are important. But our gratitude has to be more than visits to the troops, and once-a-year Memorial Day ceremonies. We honor the dead best by treating the living well.

I am definitely a Type A personality, always rushing around, trying to do too much, not good at just lying on the beach. But I'm so thankful for everything I have: wonderfully supportive parents and sisters, the best husband in the world, terrific students I love teaching and hanging out with, and above all, my two amazing daughters.
All I've ever tried to do is get the best out of people and to bring a bit of humour into it. Unlike, say, 'The X-Factor,' which may be great TV, but has no humour at all.
Always go into meetings or negotiations with a positive attitude. Tell yourself you're going to make this the best deal for all parties.
The best students come from homes where education is revered: where there are books, and children see their parents reading them.
The best morale exist when you never hear the word mentioned. When you hear a lot of talk about it, it's usually lousy.
The best part is still ahead of me - I haven't experienced my 'good old days' yet.
Life is unfair. I got nothing but the best.
Let me be the first to tell you, drinking alcohol is the worst thing to do in cold weather. Hot soup is the best because the process of digesting food helps to warm you up.
Fit no stereotypes. Don't chase the latest management fads. The situation dictates which approach best accomplishes the team's mission.

My hobbies include maintaining my physical and mental health. It's a full-time job. Yoga definitely helps for both of them. I'm a big fan of relaxing and not having a schedule. That's my best way to keep from going crazy.

Confidence and empowerment are cousins in my opinion. Empowerment comes from within and typically it's stemmed and fostered by self-assurance. To feel empowered is to feel free and that's when people do their best work. You can't fake confidence or empowerment.
The World Cup is a very complicated tournament - six games, seven if you make it to the final - and maybe if you lose one game you're out, even if you're the best.

Unfortunately, we can never truly know if we're making the right decision. What we do know is that wherever we are, that's where the Light wants us to be. It's the best place for us to be now. And as long as we don't try to control the situation, then we won't end up in the place we shouldn't be.

I think the best way to find out about something is to try to do it to the max. A lot of people take up a hobby or sport and then find an excuse not to carry on with it. Once I start something, I won't stop until I'm as good at it as I'll ever be.
I never had a policy; I have just tried to do my very best each and every day.
The best way to resolve any problem in the human world is for all sides to sit down and talk.
Things turn out best for the people who make the best of the way things turn out.
The best intelligence test is what we do with our leisure.
The best vision is insight.
To give and then not feel that one has given is the very best of all ways of giving.
The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
Do the best you can, and don't take life too serious.
The best preparation for tomorrow is to do today's work superbly well.
